name: Crimson Witch of Flames
title: Blazing Dissipation: Crimson Witch of Flames
desc: "I will sing no elegies. I refuse laments. I shall not sigh. I have no use for pointless noise.\nIf justice is long dead, then to whom can I offer redemption?"
in_play_description:
When the character uses a Skill or equips a Talent Card: Spend 1 less Pyro Die. (Once per Round)
Roll Phase: 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to be Pyro Dice.

skills.desc:
When the character uses a Skill or equips a Talent: Spend 1 less Pyro Die. (Once per Round)
Roll Phase: 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to be Pyro Dice.
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
